headline: Bacon Mushroom Swiss Meatloaf
name: Bacon Mushroom Swiss Meatloaf
description: Bacon, onion, mushrooms, and Swiss cheese are added to ground beef in this bacon, mushrooms, Swiss cheese meatloaf for a twist on an old favorite.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Cook 12 ounces bacon in a skillet over medium heat, turning occasionally, until browned. Transfer to a paper-towel-lined plate with a slotted spoon; set 1 tablespoon aside. Discard all but 1 tablespoon bacon grease. Add onion and mushrooms to skillet; cook until soft. Remove from heat.

Combine beef, egg, and milk in a large bowl. Stir in onion and mushrooms. Add about 4 ounces Swiss cheese, and all but 1 tablespoon bacon; stir to combine. Stir in cornflake crumbs until well blended. Shape into a loaf; place in a meatloaf pan.
Bake in the preheated oven for 1 hour. Drain fat; sprinkle with remaining 2 ounces Swiss cheese and reserved 1 tablespoon bacon. Continue baking until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes.
